name: Behind You! (Kuraviso)
description:
a short minimalistic game created from scratch for the Newbies Game Jam 2022

use "WASD" to move "E" to interact with boxes and "RightClick" to interact with torches/goals/portals

complete each level before the timer runs out!

"on the boss level you need to survive for 1 minute to be able to exit the arena!"
